app.title: Elekti
app.tagline: Batla setlhopha sa gago sa dipolotiki

landing.title: Batla Setlhopha Sa Gago Sa Dipolotiki
landing.subtitle: Araba dipotso tsa dipolotiki tsa gago o bone gore ke setlhopha sefe sa Afrika Borwa se se tsamaelanang le ditumelo tsa gago.
landing.aboutLink: Ithute ka ga mokgwa wa rona
landing.privacy: Dikarabo tsa gago di bolokwa fano mme ga di a kabelwana.

confidence.low: Tsamaelano e e bokoa - akanya ka go sekaseka ditlhopha tsotlhe

about.title: Ka ga Elekti
about.methodologyText: Elekti e dirisa mokgwa o o feletseng, o o ikaegileng ka bosupi go bapisa dikakanyo tsa gago tsa sepolotiki le mekgatlho ya sepolotiki ya Aforika Borwa. Thulaganyo ya rona e diretswe go nna e e siameng, e e leng pepeneneng, le e e sa tseyeng letlhakore.
about.howItWorksText: O araba dipotso di le 28 tse di rulagantsweng ka kelotlhoko tse di akaretsang mafapha a makgolo a pholisi go akaretsa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, thuto, ikonomi, taolo le dintlha tsa loago. Potso nngwe le nngwe e dirilwe go senola dikgetho tsa gago tsa dipolotiki ntle le kgatlhanong le setlhopha sepe.
about.scoringText: Karabo nngwe le nngwe e o e fileng e tsamaisanngwa le maemo a ditlhopha a a kwadilweng a a tswang mo dimaniifesto tsa semolao, dikwalo tsa pholisi le dipolelo tsa setšhaba. Ditlhopha di amogela dintlha tse di lekantsweng go ya ka kamoo maemo a tsona a a buetsweng a tsamaelanang le dikarabo tsa gago. Dintlha tseno di dirilwe tse di tlwaelegileng mo sekaleng sa 0-100, ka tsamaelano ya gago e e kwa godimo le tse dingwe di tlhamilwe sentle. Re go fa gape tlhagiso ya tshepo go go thusa go tlhaloganya gore tsamaelano ya gago e nonofile jang.
about.transparency: Boikano Jwa Rona Go Nna Pepeneneng
about.transparencyText: Maemo otlhe a ditlhopha le boima jwa dintlha di tlhomamiswa ka patlisiso e e tiileng ya dikwalo tsa semolao tsa ditlhopha. Mokgwa wa rona o buletswe mme o ka sekasekwa. Ga re thuse setlhopha sepe sa dipolotiki kgotsa lenaneo - maikaelelo a rona fela ke go go thusa go dira ditshwetso tse di nang le kitso tse di ikaegileng mo ditumelong tsa gago le maemo a a builweng ke ditlhopha.
about.dataSourcesText: Maemo a ditlhopha a theilwe mo dimanifesto tsa setšhaba, dikwalo tsa pholisi, direkoto tsa boutu jwa palamente le dipolelo tsa setšhaba tse di netefaditsweng. Re ntšhwafatsa data ya rona gangwe le gape go bontsha diphetogo tsa pholisi. Metswedi yotlhe e tswa mo ditsaneleng tsa semolao tsa ditlhopha kgotsa mekgatlo ya ditaba e e tlotwang. Fa o dumela gore tshedimosetso epe ga e nepagale, re amogela ditokafatso ka dikwalo tse di siameng.
about.privacyText: Sephiri sa gago se botlhokwa thata. Re dumela gore dikakanyo tsa gago tsa dipolotiki ke tsa sephiri thata mme di tshwanelwa ke maemo a a kwa godimo a tshireletso.
about.noTrackingText: Ga re dirise di-cookies, analytics pixels, kgotsa thekenoloji epe ya go latela. Ga re kgone go bona dikarabo tsa gago, ga re kgone go go lemoga, mme ga re na kgatlhego ya go dira jalo. Dikarabo tsa gago tsa dipotso ga di romelelwe go diserwara tsa rona.
about.localOnlyText: Sengwe le sengwe se diragala mo seinyakising sa gago. Dikarabo tsa gago di bolokilwe fela mo sediring sa gago le gangwe fela. Fa o phimola data ya seinyakisi sa gago, dipoelo tsa gago di nyelela ka bosakhutleng - ga re na backup ka gonne ga re kake ra nna le tsona mo tshimologong.
about.sharingText: Fa o abelana dipoelo, dikarabo tsa gago di khoudiwa ka tlhamalalo mo link ya URL ka bowayo. Se se raya gore mongwe le mongwe yo o nang le link eo a ka bona dipoelo tsa gago, fela data ga e ame diserwara tsa rona. O laola gore ke mang yo o bonang dipoelo tsa gago ka go laola gore ke mang yo o fiwang link eo. Phimola link, mme dipoelo tsa gago ke tsa sephiri gape.
about.analyticsText: Re dirisa Cloudflare Web Analytics, tirelo ya analytics e e tlotlang sephiri e e sa diriseng di-cookies, e e sa lateleleng batho ka noši mo dikgaolong tsa web, mme e e sa kgobokanyeng tshedimosetso epe e e ka lemogiwang ka botho. E re fa dipalopalo tse di kopantsweng tse di motheo (jaaka dipono tsa tsebe tse di tletseng) go re thusa go tlhaloganya fa webosaete e dirisiwa, ntle le go senya sephiri sa gago. Cloudflare ga e kgone go bona dikarabo tsa dipotso tsa gago kgotsa go go lemoga ka botho.
about.partiesText: Re akaretsa ditlhopha di le 14 tse dikgolo tsa dipolotiki tsa Afrika Borwa tse di emelang dikakanyo tse di farologaneng mo go spectrum ya dipolotiki. Kgetho ya rona e theilwe mo kemeding ya palamente, botlhokwa jwa ditlhopho, le pharologanyo ya lenaneo.
about.disclaimerText: Elekti ke sedirisiwa sa thuto, e seng seemedi sa patlisiso. Mekgatlho ya sepolotiki ke mekgatlho e e raraaneng e e nang le maemo a a farologaneng a a fetogang fa nako e ntse e tsamaya. Re go rotloetsa thata go bala dimanifesto tsa mekgatlho, go tsenela diforamo tsa setšhaba, le go netefatsa tshedimosetso ya rona ka nosi. Sedirisiwa se se bontsha go tsamaelana go ikaegilwe ka maemo a a boletsweng - puso ya nnete e ka farologana. Dirisa dipholo tse jaaka tshimologo ya go batlisisa go ya kwa teng, e seng jaaka tshwetso ya gago ya bofelo.
about.viewDataText: Mo moweng wa go nna pepeneneng, o ka sekaseka difaele tsa rona tsa data ka bowena. Difaele tse tsa JSON di na le maemo otlhe a ditlhopha, boima jwa dintlha, le metadata ya dipotso tse di dirisiwang ke algorithm ya rona.
about.scoringData: Data ya Dintlha (e akaretsa dipotso le boima)

anc.desc: African National Congress ke setlhopha se se busang kwa Afrika Borwa, se se rotloetsang demokrasi ya loago, phetogo, le go lebagana le go se lekane ka go tsena ga puso.

da.desc: Democratic Alliance e rotloetsa demokrasi ya bolokolohelo, ikonomi ya mebaraka ya mahala, le dipolotiki tse di sa akaretseng morafe ka go gatelela puso e e siameng le go tlhama ditiro.

mk.desc: uMkhonto we Sizwe Party e itebaganya le diphetogo tsa ikonomi tse di tiileng, e rotloetsa tlhabololo e e etelwang pele ke puso le go lebagana le go se siame ga histori.

eff.desc: Economic Freedom Fighters ke setlhopha sa molema o o kgolo se se rotloetsang diphetogo tsa ikonomi tse di tiileng, go dira ga puso, le kabo ya lefatshe kwa ntle ga tuelo.

ifp.desc: Inkatha Freedom Party e rotloetsa ditumelo tsa setso sa Zulu, federalism, le ikonomi ya mebaraka ya mahala ka maikarabelo a loago.

pa.desc: Patriotic Alliance e itebaganya le go lebagana le dilo tsa ba ba fallang kwa nageng, e rotloetsa bosetshaba jwa Afrika Borwa, le go baya pele dikgatlhego tsa baagi.

vfplus.desc: Freedom Front Plus e emela dikgatlhego tsa Maafrikaner, e rotloetsa federalism, ditshwanelo tsa bannye, le ditumelo tsa setso.

actionsa.desc: ActionSA ke setlhopha sa fa gare se se itebagantse le taolo e e sebedisanang, go lwantsha bosenyi, le kgolo ya ikonomi ka go dirisana le lekala la poraefete.

acdp.desc: African Christian Democratic Party e rotloetsa ditumelo tsa Bokeresete, dipholisi tsa loago tse di tshwerweng, le demokrasi ya molaotheo.

ufc.desc: Unite for Change e itebaganya le go kopanya batho ba kwa tlase le go lebagana le dikgatlhego tsa setšhaba sa selegae ka dipholisi tse di tswelelang.

sacp.desc: South African Communist Party e rotloetsa bokomanisi, ditshwanelo tsa badiri, le phetogo go ya mo setšhabeng sa bokomanisi ka taolo ya puso.

udm.desc: United Democratic Movement e rotloetsa demokrasi ya loago, kopano, le dipholisi tse di sebetsang go lwantsha lehuma le go se lekane.

aljamah.desc: Al Jama-ah e emela ditumelo tsa boIslam mme e rotloetsa toka ya loago, puso e e nang le maitsholo, le ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba gateletsweng.

cope.desc: Congress of the People e rotloetsa demokrasi ya loago, puso e e siameng, le dipholisi tsa ikonomi tse di lekanyang kgolo le boiketlo jwa loago.

q1.text: Tsamaiso ya tlhokomelo ya botsogo ya batho yotlhe e e tshegediswang ke setšhaba (tsamaiso ya mofuta wa National Health Insurance) e tshwanetse go tlhamiwa go tlamela ka tlhokomelo ya motheo ya mahala go botlhe.

q2.text: Thuto e e kwa godimo e tshwanetse go nna ya mahala go baithuti botlhe (ga go na dituelo), e seng fela thuso ya madi e e lekanyeditsweng.

q3.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tsenya mo tirisong mpho ya madi ya motheo e e sa beakanyeng mabaka go baagi botlhe, le fa go tlhokega lekgetho le le kwa godimo kgotsa go adima.

q4.text: Puso e tshwanetse go beeletsa thata mo matlong a setšhaba a malapa a a senang madi a mantsi.

q5.text: Peeletso ya matlo a setšhaba e tshwanetse go nna kgakololo le fa go tlhokega go kgaoganya ditirelo tse dingwe tsa setšhaba.

q6.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tlhatlosa lekgetho go bahumegi go tšhegetsa mananeo a setšhaba a a atolositsweng (botsogo, thuto le dimpho tsa loago).

q7.text: Afrika Borwa e tshwanetse go baya kgakololo ditumalano tsa kgwebo tse di sireletsang madirelo a selegae, le fa go raya ditlhotlhwa tse di kwa godimo tsa bareki.

q8.text: Thoto ya poraefete le ditshwanelo tsa dikgwebo tse dinnye di tshwanetse go sirelediwa ka thata kgatlhanong le go tsewa le melawana e e bokete.

q9.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tlhama mananeo a magolo a ditiro tsa setšhaba le mananeo a go netefatsa tiro go fokotsa tlhoka tiro.

q10.text: Badiri ba tshwanetse go nna le ditshwanelo tse di nonofileng tsa go itlhagisa le go buisana ka tlhamalalo le bahiri kwa ntle ga go tsena ga puso.

q11.text: BEE le go dira ka tshiamo go tshwanetse go tswelela e le dikgakololo tsa botlhokwa tsa puso go lokisa go se lekane ga morafe le ikonomi ga histori.

q12.text: Go tsewa ga lefatshe la poraefete kwa ntle ga tuelo ya boleng jwa mebaraka go tshwanetse go dumelwa ka fa tlase ga molao go potlakisa petoloelo ya lefatshe.

q13.text: Tlhabololo ya magae le tshegetso ya temo (go akaretsa ditshegetso le motheo wa balemirui ba bannye) e tshwanetse go amogela matlole a mantsi a puso.

q14.text: Naga e tshwanetse go baya kgakololo peeletso mo motlakaseng o o mpshafaditsweng (letsatsi, phefo) go feta go atolosa motlakase wa magala.

q16.text: Molaotheo o tshwanetse go fetolwa fa go tlhokega go potlakisa phetogo le go kgontsha kabo e e tswelelang.

q17.text: Kgato e e nonofileng kgatlhanong le bosenyi (le fa e tsenya tiragalo mo baeteledipele ba jaana) e botlhokwa go feta go boloka botsitso jwa sepolotiki.

q18.text: Boikemelo jwa tsamaiso ya tshiamiso le marapo a a tshwereng molato bo tshwanetse go sirelediwa ka thata, le fa seo se fokotsa bofefo jwa tsamaiso.

q21.text: Go fokotsa bosenyi, puso e tshwanetse go tlhoma mogopolo mo kotlhaong e e thata go feta go lebagana le mabaka a loago jaaka lehuma.

q22.text: Bafaladi ba ba sa dumelwang ba tshwanetse go lelekiwa le taolo e e tiileng ya moedi go sireletswa ditiro tsa selegae le dithuso.

q23.text: Puso e tshwanetse go nonotsha tshireletso ya molao ya batho ba LGBTQ+ le go tlhabolola ditshwanelo tse di lekana tsa baagi.

q15.text: Puso e tshwanetse go tsenya madi ka bonako mo go baakanyeng mafaratlhatlha a metsi le phepafatso (dipaipi, mafelo a phepafatso) mo bommasepala ba ba sa atlang.

q19.text: Aforika Borwa e tlhoka diphetogo tse di nonofileng tsa go tshwara puso, go akaretsa ditaolo tse di tiileng tsa madi a mephato ya dipolotiki le tlhotlheletso ya dikhamphani mo pusong.

q20.text: Diporofense le bommasepala ba tshwanetse go nna le maatla a mantsi a taolo ya tsamaiso ya madi, le fa go raya go fokotsa thata ya puso ya bosetšhaba.

q24.text: Dikgatlhegelo tsa bodumedi le dithuto di tshwanetse go nna le tlhotlheletso e kgolo mo go tlhomeng melao le pholisi ya puso.

q25.text: Aforika Borwa e tshwanetse go lemoga ka semolao le go thusa ditlhabololo tsa boeteledipele jwa setso (dikgosi le dikgosana) jaaka karolo ya puso.

q26.text: Puso e tshwanetse go naya matlole a mantsi le tshegetso ya dipuo tsa setso mo thutong, mefutafuteng le ditirelong tsa setšhaba.

q27.text: Aforika Borwa e tshwanetse go dira gore kgolagano ya madiplomata le kgwebo e e pharaletseng (le EU, US le baagisanyi ba Afrika) e nne pele ga go tsibogana le ditlhopha tse dingwe tsa jeopolitiki.

q28.text: Puso e tshwanetse go oketsa maatla a tlhokomelo le go fitlhelela tshedimosetso ya baokamedi go lwantsha bosenyi le bosenyi jwa boikgogomoso, le fa go ka fokotsa sephiri.

q29.text: Abortion should be legal, publicly funded where necessary, and available on request.

q30.text: The state should prioritise keeping key public utilities (power, water, rail) in public ownership rather than selling them to private firms.

q31.text: The government should actively fund and protect Afrikaans language education and cultural programmes.

q32.text: Government should make active legal and practical accommodations for religious minorities, including Muslim practices and holidays.

q33.text: The government should introduce specific legal protections and targeted support to preserve the rights and cultures of national minorities.

q34.text: The government should prioritise paying down public debt and ensuring fiscal sustainability even if it limits new social spending.

q35.text: Immigration policy should be significantly tightened including stronger border controls and stricter vetting.
